if (NOT TARGET chk_core)
    add_subdirectory("chk_core")
endif()

if (NOT TARGET glfw)
    set(GLFW_BUILD_DOCS OFF CACHE BOOL "")
    set(GLFW_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF CACHE BOOL "")
    set(GLFW_BUILD_TESTS OFF CACHE BOOL "")
    add_subdirectory("glfw")
    add_library(glfw::glfw ALIAS glfw)
endif()

if (NOT TARGET glad_gl_33_rls)
    set(GLAD_SOURCES_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glad")
    add_subdirectory("glad/cmake")
    glad_add_library(glad_gl_33_rls REPRODUCIBLE QUIET API gl:core=3.3)
    glad_add_library(glad_gl_33_dbg REPRODUCIBLE QUIET DEBUG API gl:core=3.3)
    add_library(glad::gl ALIAS glad_gl_33_rls)
    add_library(glad::gl_d ALIAS glad_gl_33_dbg)
endif()
